newsitem.title: UK: Tomkins gains as SBC Warburg repeats "buy".
newsitem.headline: Tomkins gains as SBC Warburg repeats "buy".

text.p: Shares in British baking-to-engineering conglomerate Tomkins Plc were higher on Friday after analysts at SBC Warburg repeated their "buy" advice and gave a share price target of 316p.
The shares were up 6-1/2p at 275-1/2p by 0856 GMT.
SBC Warburg gave Tomkins a sum of the parts valuation of 316p, noting that the quality of some of its operations was not recognised in its current rating, according to market sources.
The strength of the group's cash flow relative to earnings was also said to be a factor in setting the 12- month share price target.
